TUESDAY: 2-7pm (Last client seen at 6:30 pm)
Wednesdays: 10am-2pm (Last client seen at 1:30 pm)

**Closed every first Monday of the month for delivery.  Closed the last week of the month.**", "email": "", "url": "https://brightmoorconnection.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "16621 Lahser Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Riverdale", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48219", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4105618, "longitude": -83.25792369999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 740-7688", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on the last week of the month"}]}
